meanings.definition: A physical exercise involving a squat thrust followed by a jump.
meanings.sent1: After doing a burpee, I felt my heart rate increase.
meanings.sent2: The fitness instructor demonstrated how to do a burpee correctly.
meanings.sent3: I tried to do a burpee in slow motion, and it looked hilarious.
meanings.sent4: The burpee felt like a combination of a squat and a jump rolled into one.
meanings.sent5: The burpee made me break a sweat in no time.

meanings.definition: A type of exercise that combines a squat, push-up, and jump.
meanings.sent1: During the workout, we had to do ten burpees in a row.
meanings.sent2: She found it challenging to keep up with the burpee routine.
meanings.sent3: The burpee competition at the gym was intense and fun.
meanings.sent4: The burpee exercise felt like a full-body workout in just one move.
meanings.sent5: I could feel my muscles working hard with each burpee.
